description: Custom ECL queries for Platelets/Thrombocyte Count (LOINC 777-3, 26515-7)

queries.name: Refined Query V2 (Property-Specific: Number Concentration, Excl. Cord & Plasma)
queries.description: Uses Component = Platelet AND Property = Number concentration (118550005) to capture platelet counts. Excludes cord blood and plasma specimens to focus on routine blood platelet counts.
queries.ecl: << 363787002 |Observable entity (observable entity)| : << 246093002 |Component (attribute)| = 16378004 |Platelet (cell)|, << 370130000 |Property (attribute)| = << 118550005 |Number concentration (property) (qualifier value)|, << 704327008 |Direct site (attribute)| = << 119297000 |Blood specimen (specimen)|, << 704327008 |Direct site (attribute)| != << 122556008 |Cord blood specimen (specimen)|, << 704327008 |Direct site (attribute)| != << 119361006 |Plasma specimen (specimen)|
